title: Another script typeface I hope someone can identify.
author: bob850

comments.content:
It looks close to **[Billabong](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123811/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typeassociates/billabong/)** by Type Associates [2006] except of /M  
/M looks like **[Sonora (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123811/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=URW&ffam=Sonora%20Pro%20OT%20-%20Bold&fid=1624fdfe97273a9e68d227499c6a71fb&fsize=60&text=Bob%20Marks&fit=1)** which once was published by URW++ [2005] and now is available from Profonts [2005]

Thank you so much. I agree that it looks like a combination of both fonts. Thanks for coming up with the answer. I can't find the place where I can indicate that you solved the search. But thanks so much!  
- Bob
